title: Cultural landscape features in an image

content.description:
Examine the photograph, then answer the questions that follow.

Source: Pixabay
content.question: Which of the following features is most useful for describing the cultural landscape shown in the image?

choices.label: The ethnicity of the people in the image
The dragon that the people are holding
The French language on the banner hanging from the building
The clothing of the people participating in the parade

content.answer: The French language on the banner hanging from the building

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Describe the spatial patterns presented in visual sources.
